Key Match Events: India won by 160 runs (Netherlands 250 all out).
Shreyas Iyer scored 128* off 94 balls and was named Player of the Match.
Mohammed Siraj dismissed Wesley Barresi for 4 runs.
Kuldeep Yadav dismissed Ackermann for 35 runs.
Ravindra Jadeja dismissed O'Dowd for 30 runs.
Virat Kohli dismissed Edwards for 17 runs.
Jasprit Bumrah dismissed Bas de Leede for 12 runs.
Mohammed Siraj dismissed Engelbrecht for 45 runs.
Kuldeep Yadav dismissed van Beek for 16 runs.
Ravindra Jadeja dismissed Roelof van der Merwe.
Jasprit Bumrah dismissed Aryan Dutt for 5 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bat.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with India's performance, emphasizing their focus on one game at a time and the importance of enjoying the game.
Scott Edwards acknowledged the challenge of facing India and expressed pride in his team's performance, highlighting their wins over Bangladesh and South Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's players, including Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Shubman Gill, and Rohit Sharma, all bowled during the match.
India maintained a perfect record in the group stage with nine wins from nine matches.
